Linux Vs Microsoft Round 2

15 Jun 1999

"Uncomfortable, strained, replete with icy glares -- this was not your typical industry get-together, with its hypocritical politeness and warmed-over marketing hype."

PC Week hosts a new round of benchmark tests of Linux and Windows NT, and Andrew Leonard gives us the details in a delightful report in Salon technology.
